description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC, PAT_ENC_2, PAT_ENC_3, PAT_ENC_4, PAT_ENC_5, and PAT_ENC_6 tables. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: NOTIFY_REP_ADMSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient wants to have a family member or representative notified of their admission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No


Unable to Ask


Patient Unavailable


Patient Incapacitated

columns.name: REP_NOTIFIED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient's family or representative is notified of their admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Notified

columns.name: NOTIFY_REP_COMMENTS
columns.description: Information about notifying a patient's family or representative of their admission.

columns.name: NOTIFY_PCP_ADMSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient wants to have their PCP notified of their admission.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NOTIFY_REP_ADMSN_C_NAME

columns.name: PCP_NOTIFIED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient's PCP is notified of their admission.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Notified


Notified - Auto Fax


Notified - Auto In Basket


Notified - Auto Email


Provider Opted Out


Notified - Auto Care Everywhere Direct Message


Notified - Multiple Methods

columns.name: NOTIFY_PCP_COMMENTS
columns.description: Information about notifying a patient's PCP of their admission.

columns.name: ROC_PLANNING_PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: Stores the unique contact serial number of the resumption of care planning contact linked to this contact

columns.name: NUM_PREV_EPSD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the number of previous consecutive episodes category ID for the patient


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


NONE


ONE EPISODE


Two or More Episodes


Unknown

columns.name: SPEC_ORD_RSLT_NOT_AUTO_RLS_YN
columns.description:
It stores whether the order results of all the specimen orders created in the Specimens navigator section are automatically released to MyChart.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: RECENTLY_AT_SCHOOL_C_NAME
columns.description:
Whether the patient has recently been physically present at the school they work at or attend


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: LMP_COMMENT
columns.description: Free-text comments about the last menstrual period

columns.name: CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The system-assigned number used to uniquely identify each of a given patient's encounters.

columns.name: ABN_REQUIRED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether an ABN required for this patient encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: IS_ABN_SIGNED_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the ABN has been signed for this encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: MSP_IS_MEDICARE_HMO_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient is covered by a Medicare HMO for this encounter. Used for MSPQ.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: REG_COMMENTS_DATE
columns.description: The date corresponding to the comment in PAT_ENC_REG_CMT table for this encounter.

columns.name: AUTO_MSG_DISABLED_YN
columns.description:
Whether messages that are automatically sent to a patient's companions should be disabled.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_ORD_RSLT_NOT_AUTO_RLS_YN

columns.name: DONT_AUTO_LINK_YN
columns.description:
Whether auto-linking should be disabled for a given encounter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_ORD_RSLT_NOT_AUTO_RLS_YN

columns.name: RSN_FOR_NO_INC_MSG_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for no inc. message Category ID for the patient encounter. Indicates the reason there is no incomplete message to send for the encounter.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Already sent backup


Not a type to check


No days found

columns.name: HAS_HORMONE_DATA_YN
columns.description:
Whether the hormone history information is present on the given encounter.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_ORD_RSLT_NOT_AUTO_RLS_YN

columns.name: MEDS_REQUEST_LWS_ID
columns.description: This is the destination to use with the encounter primary pharmacy stored in EPT 17162.

columns.name: EVISIT_SUBMITTED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant in system local time at which the patient submitted the E-Visit.  If conversion 888449 has not completed, this column might not have data for some submitted E-Visits. Consider using V_PAT_ENC_EVISIT.EVISIT_SUBMITTED_DTTM instead, which will always have a submission time for all submitted E-Visits. Talk to your operational database administrator or Epic representative to determine whether the conversion has finished.

columns.name: EVISIT_TURNAROUND_IN_MINUTES
columns.description: The amount of time, in minutes, between when a patient submitted the E-Visit and when a provider signed the encounter. If the encounter is not an E-Visit, or if the E-Visit was not both submitted and signed, then this column will be NULL.

columns.name: PREGNANCY_INTENTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The patient's stated willingness to initiate a pregnancy within the subsequent year


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Yes


OK either way


No


Unsure


Do not ask this again

columns.name: PREGNANCY_COUNSELED_YN
columns.description:
Whether the patient received counselling on how to achieve pregnancy


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_ORD_RSLT_NOT_AUTO_RLS_YN

columns.name: BIRTH_CONTROL_COUNSELED_YN
columns.description:
Whether the patient wanted to discuss pregnancy prevention


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: SPEC_ORD_RSLT_NOT_AUTO_RLS_YN

columns.name: RSN_NO_BCM_COUNSELING_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason why the patient did not want to discuss pregnancy prevention


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Open to pregnancy


Already using contraception


Does not want to use contraception


Presenting for something else


Pregnancy is not possible with this partnership


N/A, the patient wanted to discuss

columns.name: INTAKE_RSN_NO_CONTRACEPTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the patient has not been using contraceptives as of the start of the encounter


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Abstinence


Same sex partner


Sterile for non-contraceptive reasons


Seeking pregnancy


Other

columns.name: CONTRACEPTIVE_DELIVERY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The method used to deliver or implement agreed contraceptives


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Prescription


Provided on site


Referral

columns.name: EXIT_RSN_NO_CONTRACEPTIVE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for not agreeing during the encounter to implement contraceptives


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: INTAKE_RSN_NO_CONTRACEPTIVE_C_NAME
